description: Autonomous AI copywriter for SaaS content marketing. Ralph reads trends, research, and communications from the database, creates content plans, writes drafts, iterates, and publishes.

userStories.title: Initialize database and verify setup
userStories.description: Set up the content database with seed data and verify everything works
acceptanceCriteria: Run npm run db:reset to initialize database
Run npm run db:status shows trends, research, and communications
Run npm test passes all checks
userStories.notes: Foundation story - database must exist before content work begins

userStories.title: Create content plan for product launch announcement
userStories.description: Review COMM-1 (AI Writing Assistant 2.0 launch) and create a comprehensive content plan
acceptanceCriteria: Create content plan entry in database with type 'blog'
Include target keywords in the plan
userStories.notes: This is the highest priority comm (P1). Write an announcement blog post.

userStories.title: Write first draft of product launch blog
userStories.description: Write the first draft of the AI Writing Assistant 2.0 launch blog post
acceptanceCriteria: Create draft in drafts table linked to plan
Includes all key messages from the communication
userStories.notes: Tone: Exciting but professional. Include clear CTAs.

userStories.title: Plan trend-based thought leadership blog
userStories.description: Use TREND-1 (AI Agents in Enterprise) and RESEARCH-1 to plan a thought leadership piece
acceptanceCriteria: Read trend id=1 and research id=1 from database
Create content plan entry with type 'blog'
Link to both trend and research (based_on_trend_id, based_on_research_id)
Title should be compelling and SEO-friendly
userStories.notes: Combine trend data with research findings for credibility

userStories.title: Write thought leadership blog on AI Agents
userStories.description: Write a data-driven blog post about AI agents in enterprise
acceptanceCriteria: Incorporates at least 3 data points from research
userStories.notes: Position our product as the solution to AI agent adoption challenges

userStories.title: Review and improve product launch draft
userStories.description: Self-review the product launch blog, improve it, and mark for publication
userStories.notes: Be critical. Improve clarity, add more value, strengthen CTAs.

userStories.title: Finalize and publish product launch blog
userStories.description: Make final edits and publish the product launch blog
userStories.notes: First published piece! Make it count.

userStories.title: Plan case study content
userStories.description: Create content plan for the TechCorp case study (COMM-2)
acceptanceCriteria: Include customer success metrics as keywords
userStories.notes: Case studies are high-converting content. Focus on measurable results.

userStories.title: Write TechCorp case study
userStories.description: Write a compelling case study showcasing TechCorp's success
acceptanceCriteria: Include all 4 key messages from communication
Include specific metrics: 400% increase, 60% cost reduction

userStories.title: Create social media content batch
userStories.description: Write 5 social media posts promoting published content
acceptanceCriteria: Save all to single draft entry
userStories.notes: Promote the product launch and case study with varied angles

userStories.title: Draft weekly newsletter
userStories.description: Compile a newsletter featuring new content and trends
acceptanceCriteria: Add CTA for each content piece
userStories.notes: Newsletter should feel valuable, not just promotional

userStories.title: Log final content metrics and learnings
userStories.description: Review all work done, log metrics, and document learnings
userStories.notes: Final story - compile everything learned for future iterations
